Reviews.Title: great buy
Reviews.Author: M. Meadows
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV new in 2004, and could not be happier with the purchase. It has been a great Tv. I ma concidering selling, but only to upgrade to a flatscreen. I will stick with Samsung!

ProductInfo.Features:
47-inch widescreen projection HD-ready TV with HDMI direct-digital interface; 44.3 x 38.7 x 24.4 inches (W x H x D)
7 video inputs include 2 HD/SD component-video inputs, 3 composite-video inputs, 1 S-video input, and side-panel jacks for spontaneous hookups
RealFlect video system includes Samsung Auto Self Focus CRTs, HD Fine Focus lenses, HD fine-pitch screen, antiglare protective screen
3:2 pulldown detection corrects distortion in film-based digital sources
15-watts-per-channel audio system renders powerful stereo sound; BBE Sound ensures vibrant, clear audio from all sources
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung HC-P4741W 47-Inch HD-Ready Widescreen Projection TV
